name: Commander Yashichi
skill: Deals 2027/2485 DMG to the row of enemies directly in front.
ability: Moderately increases skill DMG of all melee allies.
bond: Increases Commander Yashichi's skill DMG by %.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a foot soldier that was feared on the battlefield. He passed up promotion after promotion in order to remain on the front lines, but people were nonetheless drawn to his strength and popularity. Before he knew it, he had a whole unit awaiting his command. He still fights on the front lines these days, but now he's got a team of allies to back him up. Much of their perceived strength is thanks to their imposing appearance, but that fact doesn't do much to put their enemies at ease.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 16/08/17 - 06/09/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 03/09/2017 - 06/09/2017
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the Skill DMG of all allies by 33% during the "Ghost in the Mirror" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 16/08/17 - 30/08/17

main: "Come now, time to prepare for the next battle!"
skill: "The front lines are where the real action happens!"
summon: "I don't care if I'm a commander, I'll still fight on the front lines!"
